title: the app was unable to start oxc0000005
body: ive browsed through the boards and every rioter says its a problem with AVG but i dont even have AVG installed ive tried everything from restarting my computer to uninstalling league disabling my firewall on my computer and my router and im fresh out of ideas this problem only started when i tried to update to the new client and now my league cannot start

replies.body: When you get an error like this when trying to start League, it's sometimes caused by some kind of antivirus blocking the program from running at all. Let's try disabling any antivirus software you may still have running and see if that fixes it!
is there any way to downgrade to the legacy client since the problem only occurs when i attempt to upgrade
When you load up the patcher, at the very bottom right you should see a button called Launch Legacy Client. It's just under the blue link to create an account!

i was able to fix the problem by uninstalling and choosing to upgrade as i was reinstalling 
thank you for your help {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
